data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Karbinci do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Karbinci, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Karbinci, North Macedonia.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 699 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 266 who are far from you in Karbinci, North Macedonia from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Karbinci.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Albanian, Macedonian people might believe through him.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Karbinci, North Macedonia.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 1 believers in Karbinci, North Macedonia to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Karbinci.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.
